additional_info.cover_letter: I am excited to apply for this position as it aligns perfectly with my experience in software engineering and passion for building scalable systems. My 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, combined with my leadership skills and track record of delivering high-quality solutions, makes me an ideal candidate for this role.
additional_info.why_interested: I am particularly drawn to this company because of its innovative approach to technology and commitment to employee growth. The opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects while contributing to a collaborative team environment is exactly what I'm looking for in my next career move.
additional_info.availability_for_interview: I am available for interviews during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM PST) and can accommodate different time zones if needed.
additional_info.relocation_willingness: Yes, I am willing to relocate for the right opportunity.
